website_summaries.verdict: A good model for a decent price, though some competitors edge it out slightly in terms of features and cost.
pros: Traditional design in neutral dark hardwood for a mid-range price
We love its attached USB charging port
cons: Feels a bit less stable than some other models, and it may be too small for a large area
The wood varnish looks "cheap," according to some

customer_reviews.title: The demensions are backwards
customer_reviews.text: I would think on the demensions that the width would be the the measurement across the front of the drawer side of the table and the depth would be from the front of the drawer to the back of the table ..... but it is the opposite. What I would call the depth is what their measurement is of the width. This table is actually 14" deep and 17.5" wide!! I bought this table specifically because I wanted the 14" width. If it weren't for this I would give the table a good review. It is well packed and as sturdy as this type table could be.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little wary about getting this table, especially after seeing the reviews regarding the malfunction or lack of function in the power strip for the USB ports. I am happy to say that this product was delivered timely, was in perfect condition once unpacked, took less than 10 minutes to put together and the USB ports (and included cables) work as designed. I now have my home/work iPhones, iPad, and Mac Air all plugged in to the table recharging with no problem. It frees up multiple electric plugs and acts as a handy secondary bedside table. I would most definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This wasn't what I had hoped...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our new apartment so I had somewhere to put my meds next to the bed. This thing is far smaller than I had originally hoped. The 360° preview amazon offers is horribly misinforming. Then I go to use the usb ports and the damn thing GLOWS OBNOXIOUSLY BRIGHT BLUE! WHY DOES IT NEED TO BE THAT BRIGHT?! WHY GLOW AT ALL? A little light to the side that could be better hidden at night would have been just fine, but NOOOOO let's make it blinding! Not worth this much money. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: TheFirecat

customer_reviews.title: So the plug is useless for charging any modern smartphone
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I thought but that's on me for not giving it more thought before buying. What I do find fault with is the USB connections. I plugged a Note 8 into one of the high speed ports and the battery level dropped over night. So the plug is useless for charging any modern smartphone. I'm considering getting a USB powered reading light. Maybe it will be useful for that. Other than that the table looks nice and went together well. Just be sure to only snug the bolts down. Too much tightening and I think the wood will crack.
customer_reviews.author: USAF93

customer_reviews.title: Pre-drilled holes don’t add fit the screws provided.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this table for a couple of months now and oh my gosh. Every time I go grab something from the drawer, the face ends up in my hand. Keep in mind I’ve assemble around 30 of these in my lifetime and have never had these issues. Also the drawer fits your ring at most. Very tiny space. Back to the screws, they gave tiny screws that didn’t even reach the face of the drawer so I got my own. You can’t get in the drawer comfortably with the screwdriver either. I usually find the good in things but I’m searching for a new nightstand right now. Hence why I remembered to do this review.
customer_reviews.author: NS 200

customer_reviews.title: Night stands
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to place in my daughters room. They arrived promptly and were packaged very well. I am used to putting things together so assembly was pretty easy. I did however add wood glue to make them sturdier. Love that it had the USB ports on the back as it makes it convenient for my daughter to charger her tablet. We only use one table for the USB and only two work, but that is all we need. It also comes with a 3 way charged so you can charged any electronic you need. We added storage cubbies for storage. Every happy with this would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: eternityk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small place!
customer_reviews.text: This little nightstand is perfect for my studio! I have been looking for this size nightstand for a long time. The dimension of 17" x 14" x 24.5" is exact what I have been looking for. It's all hardwood, light and very easy to assemble. The USB ports are all working without any problem. The blue light when it's charging is not bright and can work as a night light.
customer_reviews.author: stocknewbie

customer_reviews.title: great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I like the end tables, sturdy and MADE IN THAILAND NOT CHINA!!!!!!! They came well wrapped thank God because some of box was torn by UPS. These tables are stained with a thin coat of polyurethane. The only complaint, minor is that the corner on one was rubbed and has no stain or sealer. I think if I could get some stain I could touch up. Not worth sending back because overall I like very much. would give five stars if edge corner was sealed better.
customer_reviews.author: Kokito

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid but some difficulty assembling
customer_reviews.text: I'm no wimp and have assembled a lot of furniture (yes, even Ikea stuff) but this one had 1 screw that was nearly impossible for me. I couldn't get a screw gun on it due to the angle and blockage, and it was so tight it was hard to get all the way in. Once in, it is clearly a solid table and is what we expected. Make sure to look at the dimensions to ensure its the fit you want. I cannot confirm the USB charging at the published rate, but can say they work.
customer_reviews.author: CharlotteTransplant

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy or stylish, but solid and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: I tempered my expectations based on price and reviews. Was pleasantly surprised by the tight design, easy assembly and final product. Bought two for a guest bedroom. Packaging was excellent. Assembled quickly and easily. No noticeable flaws. The usb ports all work, have an on/off switch and included a multi cord charger. They are a little bit top heavy but I put coffee table books on the shelf to firm them up. Good value at $75. Would be amazing value at $50.
customer_reviews.author: Arby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality nightstands for the money. Sturdy and easy to assemble. The drawer is preassembled to you just add the legs and the shelf. The instructions do not tell you that you’ll need a Phillips screwdriver for the shelf. The knob attachment is faulty and hard to screw in all of the way. We got one done with one of us holding the screwdriver while the other rotated the knob. For one nightstand we have up and used superglue to get the right know attachment. But overall they look great and I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Juliemhalsey

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood and great craftsmanship. It's built right.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice solid wood table for the money. Even Amazon's own table is MDF. This also has a usb charger built in. Table went together in 10 mins with a screwdriver and provided tools. Knob for drawer took some strength to install, could have been easier. Fits a 17" hp envy with about an inch left to right either side and much more in the back. Very happy. Before you put on all 4 legs, secure the bottom rack support. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Good price point for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Its not fancy, its not Koa wood, and a master wood finisher did not make it by hand. But its also not marketed as such. Price for the item is right on. Item is not bad, small imperfections, but who really spend that long looking at a night stand. Ya, blue light on one of the USB ports, plug a usb into it and its hard to see, even at night. If you need it to be 100% pitch black in the room, then you will not like the light. Its about as bright as a non LED alarm clock ( the LED ones can get stupid bright)
customer_reviews.author: Snowbvi

customer_reviews.title: Great end table, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Been looking to replace our living room end tables for some time. Walked through a few furniture stores but just couldn't find anything we liked. Searched Amazon and found this one. Very sturdy, exactly what we were looking for, and easy to assemble. Very happy with this purchase. They look great in our living room!
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've had some experiences with furniture that was poorly designed, holes don't line up, parts missing, etc., but not these tables. I bought two and they were very easy to assemble. All the holes lined up and the bolt holes where the legs meet the table top are metal lined. Very sturdy and stable when set up. The drawer slides smoothly, the table sets squarely with no wobbles, and the power ports work great. The hardest thing about setting up was putting the knob on the drawer! Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am super picky when it comes to nightstands. Most are too low for my taste, too small, or too bulky. These were like Baby Bear's items in Goldilocks and the Three Bears - just right. The drawers are a bit shallow, but still hold all the items I need them to. And the fact these have USB ports make them even better. The instructions were easy to follow and I was able to put one together in about half an hour. Once built, they are lightweight, but still fairly sturdy and look more expensive then the really are due to the details.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cary

customer_reviews.title: Poor Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I just received this end table today. I was really hoping I would end up with a good quality table separating myself from the other mediocre reviews given about this product. Unfortunately, this was not the case. Overall, the table serves its purpose: all USB ports work (thank goodness) and all the pieces assembled okay. However, the table came with dirty fingerprints on it, done with a poor paint job, the legs are not equally cut as the table wobbles, and the wood pieces that make the drawer are crooked. I only bought this end table because it was the best one I could find that looked good and had multiple USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table for the money
customer_reviews.text: Update:the charger on this is junk and everything takes forever to charge even if I only charge one device at one time. The table is still beautiful and holds up well. Beautiful table for the money! Arrived in great condition! Husband put it together with no problems. He used carpenter glue like someone suggested. The USB works so far, no problems like some have said. The drawer is a bit tight to open, but that is not an issue for us. If the USB breaks like some have mentioned, I will revise my review.
customer_reviews.author: MsHatch20

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got for my gf. $60 is kind of pricy to me, but she was so happy to get it. After putting it together I got over the price, If you put it together with care it will lie flat on the ground. And its super sturdy! Great feature on the USB ports. Main reason I reached for a more expensive product. I can say I'm happy with this product, and would recommend. Only possible downside would be how thin the bottom of the drawer was, not exactly perfect fit kind of slides around. The drawer also feels super stiff, but that loosens up with time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Knob does not twist on correctly doesn’t charge my phone just lights up
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived about 30 minutes ago, I’ve already put it togather with the Allen wrench provided and it was pretty easy. Only complaint is the knob drilled hole was not big enough for the screw it came with so I will most likely have to super glue the knob onto it. For now it’s being held on with gorilla glue tape cut into small pieces to be less noticeable So far I cannot tell if the charging ports work yet but it only lit up I’m kind of dissopointrd in that as well ugh Update: charger ports do work 👍 so my only real issue is the knob
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply terrible/ It’s good actually
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, screws do not align properly & you need additional tools such as wood glue and/or hammer to knock them into place... Screws will not screw in flushly causing legs to be wobbly. DO NOT BUY!! Edit: Okay I changed my mind this is actually a pretty good nightstand lol. I had to build it without my dad and he is the one that really does that work I just hand him tools but once I took a nap and gained some patience, it was pretty easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. The USB port works but I didn’t buy it for that. My new lamps also have ports - so I’m totally covered. The small size was exactly what I was looking for. It holds a lamp, and my phone but not much more room for anything else. The small drawer is perfect for “little bits” and glasses. The color is a dark espresso which works with my other furniture. Very sturdy solid wood makes this a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: A simple sturdy piece of furniture that performs well as a bedside table.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and the instructions were easy to follow. Recommend getting all pieces in place before tightening the screws and nuts. Check alignment as you do this. For me the finish was a little thing and I put another three coats of satin polyurethane on the top which brought the color out a little better. I also replaced the wooden knobs with some brass ones I had on hand which gave it a little sparkle. Purely a personal preference and the wooden knobs would do fine. Actually assembling and putting to use right of the box would be fine, I am just a little picky.
customer_reviews.author: Tholepin

customer_reviews.title: Night Stand
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Looks nice in the corner of the family room. All four USB ports work and charge my devices pretty quickly. Hint: plug the cord that comes with the table into a surge protector and then plug that into the wall. It will offer more protection to your devices!
customer_reviews.author: Scout Leader

customer_reviews.title: Not true Espresso Color
customer_reviews.text: I really like this night stand. It was easy to assemble, by myself and it's the perfect size. But I have two problems with it. The first being that the color is NOT Espresso. It is more of a dark cherry, not dark brown like the photos on the page. The dark cherry color is not what I was looking for. And my other problem is that the drawer is far smaller than I expected. I had planned to slide my laptop in the drawer to tuck it out of sight, but it is just an inch too small. SUPER frustrating because other than the wrong color and small drawer, it's a nice piece. :/
customer_reviews.author: S. Roser

customer_reviews.title: Suits Our Needs Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I received these nightstands because one of the boxes had been damaged. But when opened I noticed the great care that had been used in the packing, nothing was damaged at all. I assembled these very quickly, easily less than an hour for two. The espresso color goes with our existing furniture perfectly. The drawers operate smoothly and they seem very sturdy. We are very pleased with these nightstands.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Nice little end table
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an end table for the bedroom. It was easy to assemble and fits perfectly in designated spot. The stand is sturdy and definitely a good value for the money. Love the charging ability - great feature. Would buy again and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gray

customer_reviews.title: One part damaged
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but has this gash on one of the legs. I tried to press the damaged wood back into the gash to cover it up. Weirdly, the box was not damaged at all so this must have happened in packing preparation. I wish I could just get a replacement piece, but I've put in for a return. Edit: returned the first one that was damaged. Got a new one right away...however: the USB port/power station is faulty. It won't turn on or charge anything when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy S.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price. Be mindful of multiples.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking as one nightstand. No problems with the usb. Be wary when buying multiples. I bought two and the stain is not the same color. Luckily they are far enough away from each other on both sides of a king sized bed that it isn't as noticeable. Easy assembly, other than the knobs. Had to use longer screws.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaGrace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfectly balanced between cost and quality IMHO. USB plugs are very nice feature. I would consider them a 'Craftsmen' style table. The wood used for the the legs, and lower shelf have some MINOR 'Distress', or 'Character'. Perfectly normal and nothing I thought was unacceptable for use. All the parts I received were finished, and pre-assembled nicely. Final assembly was quick and easy. I had no issues. They fit the limited space we have very well. I couldn't have made these for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J Puccino

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight construction, but easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The table was easy to assemble. The quality is so-so. My biggest beef is with the handle. It's a piece of wood. I assumed it would be a metal handle. The problem is that I couldn't find a metal (satin finish) drawer pull that had the same dimensions for the holes pre-drilled into the drawer. My solution was to find a suitable handle and drill my own holes. The finish is black and looks like it will probably chip or scratch easily. Please note that the drawer is very shallow and won't hold much. For my purposes it works OK overall.
customer_reviews.author: Scottwestcoast

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive option for child's room
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to spend a whole lot of money on something for a child's room that may end up getting damaged or worse, so this was a good option. Well packed, and easy to put together; didn't even need the instructions. Only two issues: The trim is held by weak wood staples, and when I started to tighten the screws for the legs, you could hear and feel the staples getting loose. The box identifies the point of origin as Thailand, so I worry that the USB charger may not meet any regulatory standards such as UL or CE.
customer_reviews.author: azog

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table with Assembly Issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice table for my bedside. I have been looking for sometime and finally found a bedside table that fits my needs. This would be a five stare review if not for the holes to attach the side (part D) were one inch offset from where they should be. I got my trusty drill and drilled four new holes and the assembly proceeded from there without any further complications. The holes are hidden so it did not detract from the appearance. For someone without a drill this would have been a return.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Easy assembly! All of our USB ports worked when I tested them after I got done putting it together! Despite some questionable reviews I went ahead and ordered one of these night stands for my daughters room and I’m really glad I did. I decided to change the arrangement of her room and quickly ordered a second A couple days after I ordered the first. I was nervous when I received a notification that one was damaged in shipping and I was getting a refund...it still says that one is to arrive Tuesday so once I get that sorted out I would probably order another.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The table arrives with the drawer assembled, however, ours arrived with the front of the drawer hanging off and the screws were stripped. We had to buy new screws and drill new holes to stabilize the front of the drawer. The drawer was also pre-assembled crooked on the table, of which we were not able to correct. Besides the drawer issues, the rest of the assembly was fairly easy. The top of the table also has a dent/scratches on it. While these were minor, I expected to receive a table that looked brand new. I do not recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good not great
customer_reviews.text: Overall they are a little smaller than I thought. I loved the idea of usb chargers in the table and that is by far my favorite part. However, I don’t like any light in my room while I’m sleeping and there is a fairly bright blue light shining from the USB ports all the time. It does not bother my husband but it bothers me. I would give it a 3.5 if that was an option.
customer_reviews.author: emschl

customer_reviews.title: Great table with usb port
customer_reviews.text: After searching months for night stands I finally came across these tables. I ordered 2 and they arrived on time, they were very easy to assemble and I was surprised at how sturdy they were. The usb ports are very convenient and the blue lights are not bright at all. Some reviewers complained about the blue light but its not bright at all. Definitely would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these two new tables for my new house and when I took them out of the package, the screw holes and screws didn't match!! They were off by quiet a bit, so I had to scavenge through my house to find 2 screws that matched the size, and the front drawer has NO holes on one side. I had to drill a hole in it to attach the handle. But I got both of the tables to work, but both units were defective.. Honestly kind of disappointed for the amount of money
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N. Winston

customer_reviews.title: Really cute.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. I like this little table. I bought it to use as a nightstand and I really like that it has the USB ports. I wish the drawer were deeper. If the table were a teeny bit taller, that would allow for a bigger drawer. Other than that, I really like it. If you don't have a lot of room in your bedroom, it's a good size. The color works, it was easy to assemble, and it's nice that you can turn the ports on/off even if it's plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: TMR

customer_reviews.title: I love this little table!
customer_reviews.text: First off I was amazed when I opened the box to find I only had to put the legs on. The top and drawer already came assembled! I hate putting things together, so no worry with this item. It has several usb ports on it and they also included a usb adapter that covers three different types of phones like iphone, android and and another one that I'm not sure what it goes to. That was a really nice tough. I'm very happy and decided to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Ian C

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, simple and functional
customer_reviews.text: Elegant, simple and functional. the USB ports are very helpful. All my gadgets are charged at once without having to struggle to find power outlets. I bought one for my Dad too and he is super happy with its USB feature too. Loving it. Only thing I would wish for is a bit larger drawer. I took away one start for that one problem.. Wanted take 1/2 star but that's not an option :).
customer_reviews.author: A. Bapat

customer_reviews.title: These look great and are decent quality
customer_reviews.text: These look great and are decent quality. I bought two of them and they both arrived with cracked and split wood, but after assembly the cracks were hidden so I decided not to return them (splits / cracks were on the inside of the sides beneath the shelves). The usb feature is definitely a great addition. It comes with three different charging styles which should cover all phones and tablets. I have one table in the master bedroom and one in the guest bedroom so guests can easily charge their devices while sleeping. The color was very close to the photos and aside from the cracking / splitting issue, I really like the quality and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous price when charger doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Tiny table, which would be ok if the charger worked. My charger failed the first night, and the table surface came with a small scratch. Worth maybe $25 just for the table with no charger. Very annoyed I wasted $72 on this piece of cr*p.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo18

customer_reviews.title: No response from seller
customer_reviews.text: After assembly the drawer does not line up and thus will not shut all the way and looks terrible. I loosened all the fasteners and re tightened, took and compared measurements but don't see how to fix it. I think some of the components are warped. I wrote to the seller but never heard back, now the return window has closed. I have bought several other end tables from this seller and was very pleased, I can't fathom why they would totally ignore a repeat customer. Money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sacamano

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous... If you can get it out together.
customer_reviews.text: If this is able to be put together it's an amazing and beautiful piece... That being said I would like to actually put it together! I have ordered 3 and only 1 has been put together because the holes don't line up for the screws and the pegs. It's really upsetting to unbox something and then struggle to get it all back in there to ship back... Twice.
customer_reviews.author: Tavanna K

customer_reviews.title: Great little side table
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this little nightstand except the bright blue light that shines when the you’re using the USB cord to charge a device. We try to cover it but it doesn’t work well. My husband has one on his bedside too. Aside from this, great value and sturdy. Well made and super simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: TJsGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good, but missing screws.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice side table, however the right side track that allows the drawer to slide out does not have screws in it to hold it in place. I’m assuming this is just defective on mine, but it means my drawer tilts to the right, which is kind of annoying. Not the end of the world obviously and the side table is in general great, I just wish it was made correctly before coming to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, spend the extra $20 on another product.
customer_reviews.text: So this functions as a table and power port but I used the wrong size screw in one spot and the particle board was so flimsy the screw punched a hole through the side of the table with no resistance. I also put the pull on before assembling the drawer face and after undoing that, the pull was stripped and couldn't be screwed on any longer. I understand I was at fault with not reading the instructions carefully enough but as a poor person, I have assembled a large amount of this type of furniture in my life. I have never experienced the screw situation ever. I couldn't believe how flimsy the material is. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: gsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This is what happened after 3 months of use. The table is falling apart and worst off all it could have burned our house down. Was not even using the charger that got hot and burned the table and melted the plastic. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value but you need to be a little handy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Oh your funny Thai people! Why go to all the trouble to build a decent inexpensive night stand / end table and not complete the job? Where the lower shelf attaches to the legs there are no pilot holes into the legs. Modern product design 101. The price is good for what you get. The materials are acceptable. They missed some spots while staining the table. Over all, I needed a nice looking wood night stand and this will do the job. By the way, I love Thai people having worked there for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gecko

customer_reviews.title: Nice table manufacturer- needs to do better  quality  control on order contents
customer_reviews.text: Nice table some parts missing want to give higher rating but was told by Amazon customer service to"go buy screws" for those missing. Seriously? The instructions provided do not say" spend your money on this table, then go spend money on what we forgot" I contacted the manufacturer who sent the screws 2 days later. With better quality Control I'd consider a 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: ALG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Will be buying another.
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about purchasing this side table because of some of the reviews I read on here which people were complaining that the usb's did not work? I loved everything about this product. The real wood is heavy and sturdy. Assembly was super easy (under 20 minutes) and the usb's work great! Cant wait to give this to my boyfriend as part of his Valentines day gift.
customer_reviews.author: ALisha

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This table had great potential. It took me awhile to assemble it and the last thing to do was the drawer. I still haven't bought wood glue to fix it but the front of the drawer won't stay on!! I have not attempted to call about this because I don't care to put another one together nor take this apart and send it back.
customer_reviews.author: samsab

customer_reviews.title: Casual hone Vanderbilt nightstand
customer_reviews.text: Makes me want to sing. Beautiful. Has charger port on top with 3 types of chargers included for any phone. Thanks. I did use this in my dining room too. Perfectly spaced.
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: Nice but some problems with instructions
customer_reviews.text: The color of this item and the sturdiness seems to be ok. My objections was with the instructions and the available screws were just a little off. I am not sure why it is so difficult. Anyway - just note that the instructions do not indicate you also need a Philips screw driver. There are no starting bores in the legs for the shelf screws, but the wood is soft, so no big issue. The screw for the knob was way to long. I have to rummage around the garage to find one that fits. Its those little things that prevent me from giving it a higher rating. I love attention to detail and that was lacking a little.
customer_reviews.author: Chesteen Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I put two of these together from start to finish in 17 minutes with only an allen wrench and a phillips screwdriver. Everything lined up perfectly, all screws and bolts tightened easily and the finished product is rock solid and level. I was looking for a set of smaller night stands for the space and these completely filled the bill.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Wildcat

customer_reviews.title: OK but nothing special Finish and wood don't convey quality.
customer_reviews.text: We hide it on the far side of a guest bedroom so we don't have to look at it. It is reasonably solid but does not have the quality look at about the same time we got the Signature Design by Ashley Breegin Chair Side End Table Multi Sold by: Amazon.com Services LLC that looks like it cost several hundred dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Great night stand w/drawer & USB Ports! Easy to assemble if you have the tools
customer_reviews.text: Like this very much! The drawer is perfect size for everything I keep next to my bed PLUS the USB ports are EXTREMELY handy to keep my phone charged during the night & headset charged at same time. There's 3 ports! And the bottom shelf I use to store a few books or whatever. I paid for assembly because I didn't have any tools but it took the man only 20min! Paid too much for assembly but didn't know what else to do!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Night Stand!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and they look amazing! Very sturdy. It also comes with a multi connection cord that has plugs for iphone, ipad, and something else. The rubber piece over the connection is poor and sorta broke when I opened it, but I cut it off because I will never be taking cords out of it. Also the plug in for it is very long! Overall for the price I would buy this again in a heartbeat!!
customer_reviews.author: swanlakemt

customer_reviews.title: Nice side tables
customer_reviews.text: It's a very pretty side table. Super easy to put together. It was hard to get the knob on. The screw seemed too long and stopped turning when putting it together. So I found a different screw and got it to work better. Also one of our tables had a hard time connecting the cable for the charger. But we eventually got it to work. Seems strudy and the color is nice! The drawer can only fit a small book. But that's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B./ Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Came in with some dings but meh doesn’t matter. It does it’s job. Most clutter is not on table like it was before and it’s nice having drawer for my meds. I like the convenience of charging at this table rather than having to walk towards the wall for the charger and I like having the multiple charger device that was included. Lol someone gave me another charger without a charging unit but this fit it perfectly. The color is perfect and it’s just the right size in height and width. My brother was thinking of another table we already had but that was too short and too wide and I prefer the drawers
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Nishii

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and look for my room decor.
customer_reviews.text: I needed two small bedside stands and these fit the bill. I also wanted a somewhat rustic look, and these stands appear to have a rubbed oil stain finish giving them a old furniture appearance. They are very, very easy to assemble. I only wish they offered these without the USB ports at slightly lower price.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA RADKA

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made and missing items
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I reordered this item Ma th 2018 in hopes the one I received previously was a lemon, bad news... the 2nd one also had a drawer that was mounted crooked. Very disappointing! I had high hopes for this product but it fell short. It arrived late and much to my dismay the drawer is mounted crooked, there's a small ding in top, and it's missing part of the hardware, specifically the drawer knob and screw. Now I have to fit it all back in the box to return.. :(
customer_reviews.author: msg_98

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With My Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Happy with the color matched perfectly with my other bedroom dark furniture. Like the quality of the wood. No marks anywhere which some customers were indicating. Size was perfect also for the space I needed. The USB port works great! Which was one feature why I selected this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for our spare bedroom bedside tables. Our guest were especially thankful for the USB port option and they also commented the drawer was nice for their jewel and wallet storage at night. They were easy to assemble and are nice and sturdy as they are solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Mommiejoe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble putting this together until the drawer pull I am going to purchase a new knob and install it. I simply do not have the strength required to put the screw into the wooden knob. Every one that has seen this loves the charging station. It is an excellent night stand and looks great. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: vhoover1

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: They both were a perfect size for my smaller bedroom. They fit perfectly but if your looking for something with more space i wouldn’t suggest these. One of the nightstands make a buzzing noise when plugs in. So I can’t use the USB part of it tho. The other one works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Charming and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not too hard to put together. The wood screws for the bottom shelf are a little tough to get in by hand, but doable. They go in at an angle, and unfortunately, I misplaced my long philips bit for my drill. But was able to put them in by hand with some modest effort. USB charging ports work as expected. Comes with a little octopus that matches several different device port types. Charming, relatively sturdy and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a much cheaper made and low-quality item than I expected. It is made out of cheap pine, and has a ton of dings, scratches, and blemishes. The top even has a small crack in it. Notably, it isn't stained -- it's more of a paint finish with just a bit of wood-grain showing through. I purchased the espresso finish, and it is darker than the pictures made it seem (basically painted black) -- maybe I should have gone for the warm brown, but that seemed too light for my needs. The size and style is otherwise perfect for my needs, and I like the USB ports (but even those are inset crooked).
customer_reviews.author: SPDIF

customer_reviews.title: Nice night stands
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these night stands for our new king size mahogany bed frame with headboard. I thought the measurements would work but it just looks too small next to the bed. We'll keep it for now because the price was great and the UPB ports are nice to have, we'll just move it to another room with a small bed later. Assembling it would have been helpful if all the holes were there, too! We had to drill holes to complete assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: 00 based on the poor quality and craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: NOT at ALL worth what they are charging for this product. Table isn't level, rocks back and forth, the front drawer/handle comes with three TINY screws that barely tapped into the wood causing them to strip. The end result is a front door cover that is literally hanging by a thread. For the size and what I paid, I was expecting a fairly decent quality Night Stand. This is maybe only worth $39.00 based on the poor quality and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Pain to Assemble and Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. When you screw the legs in, they part they screw into cracks/warps/moves. The knobs are a huge pain to screw in all the way. Stripped the screws that came with it. Ended up having to drill out the pilot hole and use a spacer on the other side of the washer. If I wasn't handy and/or had a ton of spare parts and tools, I wouldn't have been able to assemble them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good product just one thing wrong.
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice wood. Kinda want a drill for the last shelf. Drawers a bit small. And it’s good for having a nightstand. The problem is it has chargers built in with bright blue lights. Due to the lights being right next to bed. Makes it kinda... not enjoyable. So I just don’t plug anything into it and everything works with placement.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: USB says it works for fast charge, but it in fact does not for my Samsung Note 5. Still a decent table.
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to put together, and it seems stable. The USB ports definitely work. The paperwork inside the packaging says that two of the ports are higher voltage to allow for fast charging devices, however none of the four ports will fast charge my Samsung Note 5, with either a fast wireless charger or USB charging. It still looks good, and it's definitely a table, so it's no big deal, because I didn't buy it for the USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I’m impressed with this table . It is made of actual wood and you just need to screw the legs into the preassembled table top and the shelf underneath. It comes with everything you need and is pretty sturdy! I was able to put all my textbooks and laptop for the semester on the lower shelf and it holds up great!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Delivered glued together
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product overall I thought it was a good product. But when I looked over it I found a corner on the top of the dresser was broken off and then glued back together. I just can't believe that this was deemed ok and was still shipped to me. I needed the dresser now because I brought my grandmother to live with me due to the current pandemic. I can't go out to a furniture store and needed something of quality; quickly. I didn't return it since I needed it now and also dealing with trying to return the dresser in the communities current situation just wouldn't be safest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. And they blend very well in my bedroom. I really like that it comes with 4 usb ports which comes in handy. My only issues are that it came with a few dings & knicks on it, luckily not very visible. The blue power light is way too bright, but plugging in a usb cable in the middle port shields it some, and so does my jewelry box. Lastly, one of orders was missing a 2nd screw needed to secure the drawer handle. I had to improvise, but I made it work. It is still a good night table and the best one I’ve had so far, style wise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with a warm brown color
customer_reviews.text: Directions are OK. They are very sturdy and go with an older king bed we can use again. If the puppy hadn't run off with my drawer pull they would be perfect. Oh well the chewed part is now on the bottom edge of the pull. So I will remember it every time I open the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied overall
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my space. Can't complain considering the price although the wood is obviously not the best quality and had a few dings and grooves, especially on parts that can't be seen. Quality control not perfect but still happy with the purchase. Also really like the USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son put this together by himself in a few minutes. I like it because it consolidates all of the cords and tech. I don't expect this to last forever, but I'm glad I purchased it for my son. I am hoping it gets him through high school and perhaps college.
customer_reviews.author: LiLi H

customer_reviews.title: happy with them
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of these because I needed them in a hurry, wasn't sure what I would get. I am very, very, happy with them, solid wood 5 min install , very attractive and well built.. sturdy units. Honest review feel free to message me but seriously very surpr8ised with these. Update have them in the room, guest room, buying two more for my room. Love them, well built and the usb ports are a really nice add-on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Terrible buy
customer_reviews.text: Two of the supports that the screws go thru to keep legs in place cracked and shifted during assembly. The weak link in what could have been a good product if the manufacturers hadn't decided to cut corners and save a few pennies.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Do not over tighten screws
customer_reviews.text: The tables were the correct height that we needed. The assembly instructions were easy to follow. Only suggested improvement is to place USB ports on the rear side of the table. The USB plug in ports reduce the available table top space for large items.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Boothman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive option the color is nice and quality is good enough for a guest room. The top and the shelf is pretty thin. One of mine has a 4” crack in it but it isn’t obvious and won’t be used a ton so not worth it to me to return. The drawer is very shallow, but overall I’m pleased and they will be perfect for what I’m using them for!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece of Furniture for a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: Product quality better than I expected at the price point. Easy to assemble. The only reason I didn't give five stars is the fact that the finger joints on the top can be seen if you look closely; a little more stain on this surface would have been helpful but for the price, they are hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: vamcman

customer_reviews.title: but bc it was beyond the return period policy by the time I tried four at once I am screwed with now a fine table with no charging capability
customer_reviews.text: the electrical unit shorted out the first time I connected four devices all at once. but bc it was beyond the return period policy by the time I tried four at once I am screwed with now a fine table with no charging capability.
customer_reviews.author: Steven F.

customer_reviews.title: Great table, if only the drawer were deeper.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table. It seems pretty sturdy. The USB ports make my nightstabd area look neat and organized. My only qualm is I wish the drawer were a little deeper. I like to keep my adult products and toys in the drawer so they're not in plain site, but this drawer doesn't have a lot of room. Great table otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Webber

customer_reviews.title: More than worth it
customer_reviews.text: Smallish table, but superb quality for the money. 4 usb slots, a drawer. And lower shelf/base. More than worth the money I spent. Just needed a small table for remotes, books, drinks etc...and a place to charge my phone/tablet next to my little chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sideshow 535

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous piece
customer_reviews.text: This nightstand is a beautiful addition to our bedroom. The wood color is so beautiful and rich. The usb outlets work great and the light isn’t too bright. I feared it would be after reading the reviews. It was easy to assemble and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Leiha Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these night stands. The table top and drawer came assembled. Only had to add on the legs and bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This is a good looking side table
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking side table. I bought several of them for a rental property and they look so nice in both bedrooms. Nice color, nice finish. Easy to assemble, and the usb/charging station is handy without looking too tacky on the top of the table. It has a little cover, as you can see in the product photo.
customer_reviews.author: agreen

customer_reviews.title: Quality easy to assemble but unable to charge some devices
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid piece and looks better in person than the picture. It is easy to assemble. My only complaint is that the usb ports are low amps and do not provide enough to charge devices that require more amps such as iPads, other tablets and some of the newer smart phones.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Gill

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but doesn’t always work great
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the nightstand and it looks a lot more high end then I thought it would. Although it has plenty of space for my things and USB ports for charging my devices there are some drawbacks. Sometimes the USB ports do not always work and on one of my night stands I can only use 2 of them at once and after many months one of the USB ports does not seem to work at all. Besides that, I really like these nightstands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pre-assemble drawer knob or include the right size screw..
customer_reviews.text: Nice little table snack drawer, has plenty of USB courts to charge all your stuff. One problem was attaching the drawer knob. The screw was about 3x too long so I am unable to screw it in snuggly this was the only screw of its kind so I know it was the right one. I may try a shorter screw or have to drill out the knob. Also the drawer comes installed and it’s impossible to get a screwdriver in the drawer at the correct angle. Other than the knob and the fact it’sa little bit “tippy” I’d recommend it just for simplicity and convenience of the USB ports. That’s the whole reason I got it to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: TheIanAdams

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I got these for bedroom because we really didn't have end tables. They're really nice they weren't that hard to put together but we did need some assistance from our brother-in-law and I love the charging station with the USB ports and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great little nightstand
customer_reviews.text: We just got our nightstands in today and were excited to put them together. The first one was no problem - everything hooked up properly so that you can use the charging station. The second one went together just as easily - the only problem is that the cord that connects to the charging station was defective. Outside of that, they're great - sturdy and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Came out of the box with two dents on bottom shelf. Instructions spare in tiny print. Extremely shallow holes for screws. Very difficult to drive in screws. Sides of cabinet as well as bottom started to separate upon fastening bolts. Support for sides of cabinet held together with staples that started to come out upon fastening bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Weinstock

customer_reviews.title: Get this
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. I love the storage and I use the shelf on the bottom to store my 17inch MacBook and its sleeve. It's the perfect size and color for me. Some of the reviews worried me, but I'm glad I bought it anyway. Highly recommend this, especially is you have multiple devices you need to charge. And it charges well as well! I've had if for about 3 or 4 months now.
customer_reviews.author: bre

customer_reviews.title: Great smaller side table
customer_reviews.text: great little side table. Was so easy to put together my 13 year old did it. Love that it has charging cord station built right into the top of the unit...works great in small places. Needed something small between my sons bed and a pull out twin sleeper couch. This was the perfect answer. Still gives him a drawer to store stuff in and a shelf to put something on.
customer_reviews.author: ajarsen

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: The table was easy to assemble and fit perfectly in the narrow space I had to work with. The usb connections on top were perfect for connecting my phone. However once I assembled it and tried to move it to the room where I wanted it, the top popped off. The top comes assembled so it wasn’t anything I did wrong. It turns out the screws had stripped the wood and were barely hanging on. I used an old trick of filling the holes with match sticks to fill the holes. It seemed to work but I don’t try to lift the table now that the table is in place.
customer_reviews.author: Leni28

product_meta.title: Casual Home Night Owl Nightstand with USB Ports-Warm Brown
product_meta.description: Color:Warm Brown| Style Name:Night OwlThe Night Owl Solid Wood Nightstand brings a cozy appeal to your bedroom or living room. Featuring a unique 4-Port USB Charging Station that allows easy access for charging cell phones, digital cameras, personal media players, and more at night. Open shelf and drawer provide ample space to store or deocrate. Tech-friendly features with classic style that you can count on.
feature_bullets: 4-USB charging ports built-in for convenient device charging
Spacious open lower shelf space and convenient drawer increases your storage capability
Four (4) durable legs provide balanced support for your belongings
Solid wood construction for increased durability and longevity with light an easy assembly
Dimensions: 24.5 inches high x 14.25 inches wide x 17.5 inches deep; Weight: 15.5 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,169 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
